name: Attempt Utilities
description: Utilities pertaining to attempts, percents, and more!

total-attempts.name: Show Total Attempts
total-attempts.description: Shows the total attempts on a level in game

plat-time.name: Formatted Plat. Time
plat-time.description: Shows time in platformer in the HH:MM:SS.MS format in game

issues.info: Submit your issues in the GitHub repo
